response.overview: Not a lot of information can be found regarding the creators of this website, nor the whereabouts of Trevor himself. Capturing this footage was honestly a miracle. Trevor was frequently offline, and interestingly, the day after recording this footage was recorded, the website was taken down. All that remained: a blank white page with a poorly drawn picture of Cleveland Brown in the bottom right hand corner. Spooky stuff, honestly.
response.title: talktotrevor.com
